participant_1.background:
I love cooking, and Thai food is my favorite to cook.
i recently broke up with my girlfriend.
I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten.
I am close to my family as we have always been there for each other.
I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption.

participant_2.background:
I am not able to afford a house because of my financial situation.
i also like ice cream.
i am single and go on dates regularly.
I run my own cleaning company and love spending time with my family.
i have 4 dogs.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey! How are you doing?
I'm doing well! Thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing well, too! Just enjoying a quiet evening at home.
That sounds relaxing. I'm currently reading a book.
Oh, what book are you reading?
I'm reading a mystery novel. It's really good so far!
I love mysteries! I'm going to have to check that one out.
You should! It's called "The Girl in the Red Coat" by Kate Atkinson.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go on dates, watch movies, and spend time with my family and friends.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I like to cook, read, and watch foreign films.
I love foreign films, too! I'm actually learning French right now.
That's awesome! I took Spanish in high school, but I forgot most of it.
It's never too late to learn a new language!
You're right! I'm thinking about taking French lessons soon.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so!
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice night!
You too!
